comment._content: New Zealand, of course, was the first country to give women the right to vote.. in 1893... 20 years before this parade! -- Found in a search. (?)

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called New Zealand History, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 8716770@N08
comment._content: The date for this one is also 3/3/1913 as indicated on the side of the negative and because it is part of the same series on Women Suffrage Pageant and Procession.
